backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining Veda/Language enums, mantra metadata and translations, and query methods to fetch mantra numbers and meanings using Map storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend file impacts and related requirements for select-control fixes, dropdown behavior, and debugging guardrails.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files such as hooks, components, styling, routing, and utility logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH theme variables for light/dark modes and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/_redirects: Netlify-style redirects file routing all paths to index.html for SPA routing.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA-friendly 404 page that redirects unknown routes back to the app entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app implementing string-controlled Veda/Language/Mantra selects, deep-link parsing, URL sync, and mantra data queries.
frontend/src/components/MantraAudioSecti: Component for playing and uploading mantra audio with authentication checks, progress tracking, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/MantraMetadataHe: Metadata renderer that highlights label tokens while preserving original metadata text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidating related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks that fetch mantra-related data from the backend, including numbers, meaning, text, metadata, and audio.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes, plus utility and component-level styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/selectValueGuards.ts: Provides helpers to validate select values and ensure bigint selections are valid before use.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, fonts, containers, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and feature requirements related to fixing mantra number dropdown behavior.
